data.name: Paquerette Down the Bunburrows
data.detailed_description:
Add us to your wishlist!


Check out our other bun game!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1187990/Horribunnies/?snr=1_5_1100__1100


About the Game

The bunburrows are filled with the cutest bunnies... and you have to capture them!! But they won't let you corner them so easily!
U=๏ x ๏=U U=๏ x ๏=U U=๏ x ๏=U



The bunnies flee when Pâquerette gets too close: they dash through the tunnels carefully avoiding dead ends. Will you let the lil critters outsmart you?

  • Use the bunnies' smart yet predictable behaviours against them!
  • Resort to various tools such as traps, pickaxes and carrots when simply manipulating the bunnies' moves isn't quite enough!
  • Explore diverse bunburrows, each featuring their own distinct visual and musical themes
  • Capturing bunnies is all fun and games but Pâquerette would also love to find some baby bunnies, but how?
  • Secrets may lurk deep down the bunburrows...
  • and the most important feature: BUNNIES

This game was originally created for the Ludum Dare Game Jam 48!

data.short_description: The buns... you HAVE to capture them!! Think outside the bunburrow or get outsmarted by bunnies in this pathfinding-based puzzle game!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+)
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: (If you can run any recent Unity game, you should be able to run this one!)
